sn12.40:1.2: “Yañca, bhikkhave, ceteti yañca pakappeti yañca anuseti ārammaṇametaṃ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
sn12.40:1.4: Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe virūḷhe nati hoti.
sn12.40:1.7: Cutūpapāte sati āyatiṃ jāti jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti.
sn12.40:2.1: No ce, bhikkhave, ceteti no ce pakappeti atha ce anuseti, ārammaṇametaṃ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
sn12.40:2.3: Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe virūḷhe nati hoti.
sn12.40:2.6: Cutūpapāte sati āyatiṃ jāti jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti.
sn12.40:3.1: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, no ceva ceteti no ca pakappeti no ca anuseti, ārammaṇametaṃ na hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
sn12.40:3.2: Ārammaṇe asati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn12.40:3.3: Tadappatiṭṭhite viññāṇe avirūḷhe nati na hoti.
sn12.40:3.6: Cutūpapāte asati āyatiṃ jāti jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhanti.
